channel.title: Need Help: Fixing This Basic Statment (PLZ HELP!)
channel.description:
[code]characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(FileHandler.mainPath,"+playerName2+".txt"));[/code]
Hey i get the error "unclosed string literal' , and i was wondering if one of use cauld fix the statement for me, i am soo tired and cannot think, it will be much appriateded thanks
Kind Regards, Zandia

item.title: Need Help: Fixing This Basic Statment (PLZ HELP!)

item.description:
@Oh_Noes_PIERATS wrote:

1 sec let me open my source n ill fix i lol

WILL work: characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./characters/"+playerName2+".txt"));
